name: Memorable Melodies
description:
Memorize a tune that is related to a ball of certain colour. During game play when you hear a tune, remember to which color of a ball it's related and tap that ball. The game consists of 7 levels and an ending. The game ends on the 10th mistake. 5 tunes plus an ending tune in total. The tunes are short old school chip tune like tunes.

There is a cheat: During game play tap at the upper right corner of the screen and all the mistakes are cleared.

Due to technical reasons, the font is changed in version 1.3.

Latest version is 1.4.
